review: Great product! We love the Apple TV. Ots a great addition to the iPad, iphone family. I recommend this product to all apple lovers.
author: Taylor Lambert

review: Love the Apple TV.  We use it daily as we don't really watch much traditional TV.  Super easy to install and get started.
author: CCnc

review: I recently cancelled my cable to try Apple TV. It is amazing. There are more things on there to watch than I can even imagine. I was just browsing through the network app the other day, and couldn't believe the choices! Definitely recommend.
author: B. Day

review: Not many channels, and more than a few, like ABC, HBO, ESPN, MLB, etc require a cable subscription.  I'm gueesing even ROKU has this problem with sports and other premiium content.
author: D. Brown "dpbrown777"

review: i would definitely recommend getting an Apple TV especially if you own other apple products because you can stream them thru the TV
author: carebear

review: It's an Apple product so it is expected to be top quality and it does not disappoint. You can turn any tv into a wifi tv with one of these, as well as access all info fron your iTunes accounts great addition to any television set up
author: Rwwmson

review: No surprises, its gorgeous, its wonderful, its amazing, its Apple TV. Easy to setup (a child could do it without reading a single instruction manual because it walks you through everything), easy to navigate, beautiful interface. Glad the price has come down in recent years but I'd still probably pay what it used cost. I'm in love.
author: Jessie

review: I have asked and asked why this is happening and I have found that others online are having the same problem.  With my macbook air, when I try to connect to apple TV, it shuts down my entire network.  I have to reboot everything.  No help in sight!
author: Paul

review: Forget about buying this version of the Apple TV now that a newer version will be coming up soon.  Hardware is definitely outdated.  My Roku 2 operates smoothly, but ATV hangs every so often.  It's comparable to Roku 1 at best so definitely should not be considered at this time.
author: steve

review: We are officially cord cutters, and now watch everything on the Apple TV. Netflix, Hulu, iTunes, etc. over the past year or so the content channels have multiplied like rabbits. The connection with iCloud for all of our music, purchased movies and photos is liberating, and AirPlay works like some vision of the future out of a science fiction movie.
author: Reid Sorenson
